scripts.build: if-env TYPE=server && (cd server/auth-service && npm install) && (cd server/user-management-service && npm install) && (cd server/link-up-management-service && npm install) && (cd server/link-up-request-service && npm install) && (cd server/notification-service && npm install) && (cd server/messaging-service && npm install) || (cd client && npm install)
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:auth-service" "npm run start:user-management-service" "npm run start:link-up-management-service" "npm run start:link-up-request-service" "npm run start:notification-service" "npm run start:messaging-service" "npm run start:client"
